full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL CHEN RTA MGRIN YANG GSANG KHROS PA YAB YUM GYI BSGOM BZLAS NYAMS SU LEN TSUL GNAD DON SNYING PO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(ZHES DPAL RTA MGRIN YANG GSANG KHROS PA YAB YUM GYI BSGOM BZLAS BYED TSUL MDOR BSDUS PA GNAD DON SNYING PO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DON GNYER CAN 'GA' ZHIG GIS NYAMS LEN RGYUN 'KHYER DU, ,BTZUN GZUGS ^DAM TSIG RDO RJES DAM PA GONG MA'I MAN NGAG BZHIN 'KHYER BDE GNAD DON 'DUS SU BKOD PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN 'GRO LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
